name: Radium
description: Synced stream and video playback with VOD capabilities utilizing HLS. Developed for movie nights but has many use cases.

BASE_URL.description: URL of the application - For Heroku it will be: https://APP-NAME.herokuapp.com   Replace APP-NAME with the name entered above.

HLS_URL.description: HLS Stream URL (OPTIONAL - Can be changed in the app).

ADMIN_TOKEN.description: Enter an admin token for authentication or leave blank for a generated one found in the server logs (OPTIONAL).

OMDB_API_KEY.description: OMDB API Key for resolving the Now Playing feature (OPTIONAL).
